DOC.brief_summary: The aim study analyse compare quality fixation femoral implant without cement . One hundred thirty patient operate include 2 group , first one TKA cement second one TKA cementless femoral implant . The study criterion include IKS ( International Knee Society ) score analysis radiolucent line femur . Patients review 2 , 6 12 month .
DOC.brief_title: Total Knee Arthroplasty ( TKA ) Cemented Versus Cementless
DOC.criteria: Osteoarthritis ( medial and/or lateral femorotibial arthritis and/or patellofemoral arthritis ) Indication surgical treatment total knee arthroplasty Age 50 90 year Acceptance signature participate Rheumatoid inflammatory arthritis Association surgical procedure ( osteotomy ) Range motion inferior 90Â° Previous knee surgery ( except arthroscopy )
